post:
Special offer plan:

* 2 CPU Core 
* 2 GB Ram
* 50 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 6TB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (10gbit burst in Amsterdam)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* Free Direct Admin
* DDOS protected.

€20 for 6 months 
€35 /year

Order Link London: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=185
Order Link Amsterdam: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=215

**FAQ/Terms tl;dr**

1. No Tor
2. No torrenting
3. Orders placed via proxy/vpn will be automatically rejected
4. We are not accepting orders from China or Brazil at this time.
5. London CPU's are a mix of E3-1270v5/6 and E-2276G there are no guarantees of which one you get.
6. Amsterdam CPU's are a mix of E2276G and E2278G, you are more likely to get E-2278G cores at the time of writing.
7. This offer is valid for the next 7 days only.

Any other questions I am happy to answer :)
